title: Test Publishing to GitHub Pages with Quarto
text:
Example: Simple Matplotlib Plotting
Take \(x \in [0,30]\) and \(y_{1} = 2\sin{x}, y_{2} = 4\sin{x}\)


Code
import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

x = np.arange(30)
y1 = 2 * np.sin(x)
y2 = 4 * np.sin(x)

plt.figure()
plt.ylabel(r'$y$')
plt.xlabel(r'$x$')

plt.plot(x,y1, label = r"$y_{1}$")
plt.plot(x,y2, label = r"$y_{2}$")

plt.legend()
